sourcesContent:
import {
  AmbientLight,
  Object3D,
  PointLight,
  SpotLight
} from 'three'

export const LightsList: Object3D[] = []

const ambientLight: AmbientLight = new AmbientLight('rgb(255, 255, 255)', 0.5)

export const pointLight: PointLight = new PointLight(
  'rgb(240, 225, 240)',
  3,
  80,
  0.1
)

pointLight.position.set(20, 20, 20)

export const spotLight: SpotLight = new SpotLight(
  'rgb(255, 255, 255)',
  1,
  200,
  Math.PI / 180 * 30,
  0,
  0
)

spotLight.castShadow = true

spotLight.position.set(100, 50, 100)



LightsList.push(ambientLight,pointLight,spotLight)
